titles.title: A bill for the relief of Barry W. Jackson of Fairbanks, Alaska; and Thomas Fenton of Fairbanks, Alaska.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 8/7/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a sum to be determined to two named individuals in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising from legal services performed by such individuals on behalf of Arctic Slope Eskimos and other Alaska Natives in connection with the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act.
